title: Divorce in writing valid? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: says if a man divorces his wife three times in writing will she get divorced this is an issue of dispute and issues of divorce are not answered in an email this has to be answered in a court a muslim court where the judge would tell you after hearing from the man and from the wife in order to know the intentions the circumstances how it happened was it in anger or a normal situation so this needs a session to answer it
